channel.title: [Pi] Adding keyboard symbols
channel.description:
hey guys, Im not sure if this is possible or even how to do this but i wanna try and make it so you can say these symbols in-game:
> ~ < ^ , etc etc if this is possible can someone please let me know? and how to do it?
Thanks
